websites.title: EA FC24 Pro Club Builder
websites.description: Website that builds custom players for pro club mode.

websites.title: Spotify Clone
websites.description: Half clone with play futures.Experience the ultimate music streaming platform with our Spotify clone. Discover endless playlists, access a vast library of tracks, and enjoy personalized recommendations tailored just for you. Dive into a world of music where every beat brings joy.

websites.title: Weather App With API
websites.description: Stay informed with our intuitive weather app for accurate forecasts anytime, anywhere. Needs openweathermap.org api.

games.title: ToDo Game!
games.description: An application where you can earn coins by completing tasks and use these coins to purchase free time. Built using React and JSON server.

games.title: Fitness App
games.description: Using local storage to store your data. Built with TypeScript. This application offers you a nutrition and training program tailored to your preferences.
